root.name: Tengai Makyou III: Namida
root.description: OverviewTengai Makyou III: Namida is the the third numbered entry in the long running Tengai RPG series for the PlayStation 2. The game was developed by Red Company and was published by Hudson in Japan on April 14, 2005.DevelopmentOriginal Namida LogoTengai Makyou III: Namida was originally announced as a PC Engine-CD game and was going to take advantage of the new Arcade Card Duo. However the title was eventually cancelled and was re-announced in 1995 as a title for Hudson's new console, the PC-FX. Namida was one of the most hotly anticipated titles for the system but in July 1997 the game was cancelled once again late into its development due to the PC-FX's poor sales and small user-base. Hudson and Red later completely reworked Namida and finally released the title in 2005 for the PS2.
